title: Collaborative Shadows: Distributed Backdoor Attacks in LLM-Based Multi-Agent Systems
summary: LLM-based multi-agent systems (MAS) demonstrate increasing integration into next-generation applications, but their safety in backdoor attacks remains largely underexplored. However, existing research has focused exclusively on single-agent backdoor attacks, overlooking the novel attack surfaces introduced by agent collaboration in MAS.
